front.title: Script Execution Environment Specification For Distributed Management Platforms

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management InformationBase (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internetcommunity. In particular, it describes managed objects used forcharacterizing and configuring a well-constrained execution environmentfor the Script MIB [RFC2592], suitable for use on agent and mid-levelmanager platforms.
